::FireBlade::
FireBlade this time saw the new bot aim at him since he was right in 
front of the base.  He took the shots to his armour and with a few 
quick strides he was in front of the bot. The towering 15 foot bot 
sliced at the bot whith his gian 6'long by 1 and 1/2 feet wide blade.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Khonkolor::
> 
> Khonkolor had seen in screen what had done Decepticons with Condor. 
He was anger and he wished kill some Decepticons. When he heard all 
noyses  from battle field he took his blaster and ran out side he 
aimed Fireblade  and shoot. 
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: gunthers8@n...

>   Subject: Re: WAR!!!
> 
> 
>   ::FireBlade::
>   FireBlade doesn't see the missiles coming from Sky Linx and is 
nailed
>   with the first one in the side. He stumbles sideways and lookes 
to see
>   the other three coming at him. He runs and uses his jump jets to 
pop
>   up into the air. The missiles land beneath him and throw him 
forward
>   closer to the CF.
> 
>
